page.title: 11POPULATION
page.content:
{POPULATION
The population in our area is very low because it is mainly a country area. There are few houses which accomodate a normal sized family.The density of population in the area is quite low because it is a quiet area with no main tourist attractions. The development of industry and housing from Reading have stopped. The population is around 500 people. The population is spread out and well seperated. Apart from one small village, Beech Hill, and a section of another, Swallowfield. The population lives in isolated farm houses. Many of the people that live in this area are quite wealthy. Many of their houses have private swimming pools. The population mainly consists of adults quite a few of whom work for
